actions.name: ApproveSkill
actions.description: Grants permission to associate a skill with the organization under the customer's AWS account

actions.name: AssociateContactWithAddressBook
actions.description: Grants permission to associate a contact with a given address book

actions.name: AssociateDeviceWithNetworkProfile
actions.description: Grants permission to associate a device with the specified network profile

actions.name: AssociateDeviceWithRoom
actions.description: Grants permission to associate device with given room

actions.name: AssociateSkillGroupWithRoom
actions.description: Grants permission to associate the skill group with given room

actions.name: AssociateSkillWithSkillGroup
actions.description: Grants permission to associate a skill with a skill group

actions.name: AssociateSkillWithUsers
actions.description: Grants permission to make a private skill available for enrolled users to enable on their devices

actions.name: CompleteRegistration
actions.description: Grants permission to complete the operation of registering an Alexa device

actions.name: CreateAddressBook
actions.description: Grants permission to create an address book with the specified details

actions.name: CreateBusinessReportSchedule
actions.description: Grants permission to create a recurring schedule for usage reports to deliver to the specified S3 location with a specified daily or weekly interval

actions.name: CreateConferenceProvider
actions.description: Grants permission to add a new conference provider under the user's AWS account

actions.name: CreateContact
actions.description: Grants permission to create a contact with the specified details

actions.name: CreateGatewayGroup
actions.description: Grants permission to create a gateway group with the specified details

actions.name: CreateNetworkProfile
actions.description: Grants permission to create a network profile with the specified details

actions.name: CreateProfile
actions.description: Grants permission to create a new profile

actions.name: CreateRoom
actions.description: Grants permission to create room with the specified details

actions.name: CreateSkillGroup
actions.description: Grants permission to create a skill group with given name and description

actions.name: CreateUser
actions.description: Grants permission to create a user

actions.name: DeleteAddressBook
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an address book by the address book ARN

actions.name: DeleteBusinessReportSchedule
actions.description: Grants permission to delete the recurring report delivery schedule with the specified schedule ARN

actions.name: DeleteConferenceProvider
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a conference provider

actions.name: DeleteContact
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a contact by the contact ARN

actions.name: DeleteDevice
actions.description: Grants permission to remove a device from Alexa For Business

actions.name: DeleteDeviceUsageData
actions.description: Grants permission to delete the device's entire previous history of voice input data and associated response data

actions.name: DeleteGatewayGroup
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a gateway group

actions.name: DeleteNetworkProfile
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a network profile by the network profile ARN

actions.name: DeleteProfile
actions.description: Grants permission to delete profile by profile ARN

actions.name: DeleteRoom
actions.description: Grants permission to delete room

actions.name: DeleteRoomSkillParameter
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a parameter from a skill and room

actions.name: DeleteSkillAuthorization
actions.description: Grants permission to unlink a third-party account from a skill

actions.name: DeleteSkillGroup
actions.description: Grants permission to delete skill group with skill group ARN

actions.name: DeleteUser
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a user

actions.name: DisassociateContactFromAddressBook
actions.description: Grants permission to disassociate a contact from a given address book

actions.name: DisassociateDeviceFromRoom
actions.description: Grants permission to disassociate device from its current room

actions.name: DisassociateSkillFromSkillGroup
actions.description: Grants permission to disassociate a skill from a skill group

actions.name: DisassociateSkillFromUsers
actions.description: Grants permission to make a private skill unavailable for enrolled users and prevent them from enabling it on their devices

actions.name: DisassociateSkillGroupFromRoom
actions.description: Grants permission to disassociate the skill group from given room

actions.name: ForgetSmartHomeAppliances
actions.description: Grants permission to forget smart home appliances associated to a room

actions.name: GetAddressBook
actions.description: Grants permission to get the address book details by the address book ARN

actions.name: GetConferencePreference
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the existing conference preferences

actions.name: GetConferenceProvider
actions.description: Grants permission to get details about a specific conference provider

actions.name: GetContact
actions.description: Grants permission to get the contact details by the contact ARN

actions.name: GetDevice
actions.description: Grants permission to get device details

actions.name: GetGateway
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the details of a gateway

actions.name: GetGatewayGroup
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the details of a gateway group

actions.name: GetInvitationConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the configured values for the user enrollment invitation email template

actions.name: GetNetworkProfile
actions.description: Grants permission to get the network profile details by the network profile ARN

actions.name: GetProfile
actions.description: Grants permission to get profile when provided with Profile ARN

actions.name: GetRoom
actions.description: Grants permission to get room details

actions.name: GetRoomSkillParameter
actions.description: Grants permission to get an existing parameter that has been set for a skill and room

actions.name: GetSkillGroup
actions.description: Grants permission to get skill group details with skill group ARN

actions.name: ListBusinessReportSchedules
actions.description: Grants permission to list the details of the schedules that a user configured

actions.name: ListConferenceProviders
actions.description: Grants permission to list conference providers under a specific AWS account

actions.name: ListDeviceEvents
actions.description: Grants permission to list the device event history, including device connection status, for up to 30 days

actions.name: ListGatewayGroups
actions.description: Grants permission to list gateway group summaries

actions.name: ListGateways
actions.description: Grants permission to list gateway summaries

actions.name: ListSkills
actions.description: Grants permission to list skills

actions.name: ListSkillsStoreCategories
actions.description: Grants permission to list all categories in the Alexa skill store

actions.name: ListSkillsStoreSkillsByCategory
actions.description: Grants permission to list all skills in the Alexa skill store by category

actions.name: ListSmartHomeAppliances
actions.description: Grants permission to list all of the smart home appliances associated with a room

actions.name: ListTags
actions.description: Grants permission to list all tags on a resource

actions.name: PutConferencePreference
actions.description: Grants permission to set the conference preferences on a specific conference provider at the account level

actions.name: PutDeviceSetupEvents
actions.description: Grants permission to publish Alexa device setup events

actions.name: PutInvitationConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to configure the email template for the user enrollment invitation with the specified attributes

actions.name: PutRoomSkillParameter
actions.description: Grants permission to put a room specific parameter for a skill

actions.name: PutSkillAuthorization
actions.description: Grants permission to link a user's account to a third-party skill provider

actions.name: RegisterAVSDevice
actions.description: Grants permission to register an Alexa-enabled device built by an Original Equipment Manufacturer (OEM) using Alexa Voice Service (AVS)

actions.name: RegisterDevice
actions.description: Grants permission to register an Alexa device

actions.name: RejectSkill
actions.description: Grants permission to disassociate a skill from the organization under a user's AWS account

actions.name: ResolveRoom
actions.description: Grants permission to resolve room information

actions.name: RevokeInvitation
actions.description: Grants permission to revoke an invitation

actions.name: SearchAddressBooks
actions.description: Grants permission to search address books and list the ones that meet a set of filter and sort criteria

actions.name: SearchContacts
actions.description: Grants permission to search contacts and list the ones that meet a set of filter and sort criteria

actions.name: SearchDevices
actions.description: Grants permission to search for devices

actions.name: SearchNetworkProfiles
actions.description: Grants permission to search network profiles and list the ones that meet a set of filter and sort criteria

actions.name: SearchProfiles
actions.description: Grants permission to search for profiles

actions.name: SearchRooms
actions.description: Grants permission to search for rooms

actions.name: SearchSkillGroups
actions.description: Grants permission to search for skill groups

actions.name: SearchUsers
actions.description: Grants permission to search for users

actions.name: SendAnnouncement
actions.description: Grants permission to trigger an asynchronous flow to send text, SSML, or audio announcements to rooms that are identified by a search or filter

actions.name: SendInvitation
actions.description: Grants permission to send an invitation to a user

actions.name: StartDeviceSync
actions.description: Grants permission to restore the device and its account to its known, default settings by clearing all information and settings set by its previous users

actions.name: StartSmartHomeApplianceDiscovery
actions.description: Grants permission to initiate the discovery of any smart home appliances associated with the room

actions.name: TagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to add metadata tags to a resource

actions.name: UntagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to remove metadata tags from a resource

actions.name: UpdateAddressBook
actions.description: Grants permission to update address book details by the address book ARN

actions.name: UpdateBusinessReportSchedule
actions.description: Grants permission to update the configuration of the report delivery schedule with the specified schedule ARN

actions.name: UpdateConferenceProvider
actions.description: Grants permission to update an existing conference provider's settings

actions.name: UpdateContact
actions.description: Grants permission to update the contact details by the contact ARN

actions.name: UpdateDevice
actions.description: Grants permission to update device name

actions.name: UpdateGateway
actions.description: Grants permission to update the details of a gateway

actions.name: UpdateGatewayGroup
actions.description: Grants permission to update the details of a gateway group

actions.name: UpdateNetworkProfile
actions.description: Grants permission to update a network profile by the network profile ARN

actions.name: UpdateProfile
actions.description: Grants permission to update an existing profile

actions.name: UpdateRoom
actions.description: Grants permission to update room details

actions.name: UpdateSkillGroup
actions.description: Grants permission to update skill group details with skill group ARN
